name: LD49 - Road to Joy
description:
Road to Joy

Follow the most famous, unstable virtuoso through his music and challenges.

! Notice

Movement of the character is highly dependent on mouse dpi. If you struggle try changing your dpi to a higher value (e.g 4000 dpi) and playing in full screen.

Road to Joy is a mouse only platformer about Ludwig van Beethoven and his struggles.

# Controls

ActionInputMoveMove mouse left / rightReset levelRJumpLeft click / X / Bounce into musical note # Info

This game is best played in full screen mode, otherwise make sure your mouse cursor stays within the game window.

# Version log

v1.1: Fixed exported binary version to include the Pck files and export a release build. No other fixes were applied.
